org.mockito.junit

Class MockitoJUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mockito.junit.MockitoJUnit

  • public class MockitoJUnit
extends Object
    Mockito supports JUnit via:
    • JUnit Rules - see MockitoRule
      JUnit runners - see MockitoJUnitRunner
      JUnit Jupiter extension
Since:
1.10.17
